short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This WebRTC screen capturing extension can be used within any WebRTC library/application! Use getScreenId.js!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension simply captures content of your screen. It returns source-id to callee; and that source-id can be used as chromeMediaSourceId in WebRTC applications to capture screen's MediaStream.
